page.title: 10EMPLOYMENT IN S.HARRIS
page.content: There is a high rate of unemployment in the area and most young people leave the island either to go to colleges and universities or to look for employment elsewhere. Jobs in our area :_ {TEACHERS} _ 14 {DOCTORS} _ 1 {NURSES } _ 1 {POSTMEN} _ 2 {ELECTRICIAN} _ 1 {PLUMBERS} _ 2 {BUS DRIVERS} _ 5 { JANITORS } _ 1 {AMBULANCE DRIVER } _ 1 {LORRY DRIVERS} _ 3 {JOINERS & BUILDERS }_ 4 {CRAFT WORKERS }_ 3 {HOTEL WORKERS }_ 8 {SHOP ASSISTANTS }_ 5 {POST OFFICE ASSISTANTS}_ 3 {* HOME HELP } _ 20 {* HOME HELP }is a part time cleaning job done by women to help old or disabled people living alone.
